data.name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Mini-Album Track 16 - Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium Special Arrange Medley CAP-JAMS Ver.
data.detailed_description:
Close out the Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Mini-Album nostalgia trip with a roaring medley jam-packed with grooving arcade tunes, including:

  • Saturday Night Slam Masters - Tokyo (Stage 1)
  • SONSON - Main Theme
  • Gan Sumoku - Stage 1-4-7-9 Boss Introduction - Stage Theme
  • Mega Man: The Power Battle - Player Select
  • Savage Bees - Main Theme
  • Eco Fighters - Stage 2
This medley is arranged by Capcom's official band "CAP-JAMS". "CAP-JAMS" consists of members who belong to Capcom's sound department and are engaged in the music-related productions.
